name: In the Crib of the Mountain Prince - GHU Game Jam
name_original: In the Crib of the Mountain Prince - GHU Game Jam
description:
Someone has stolen all of the Mountain Prince's furniture! Explore the forest and see if you can get them back by helping the various denizens of the forest.

An adventure game with a lot of quirky characters, strange situations and about 2000 words written. There are several different reactions from the characters depending on the situation so make sure to converse.

Made for a game jam hosted by Game Hub Umeå, 2022 feb 13

Credits:

  • Parrexion: Programming
  • Arren: 2D art and level design
  • Frog: 3D art and level design
  • Hicksu: Audio and story
